channel.title: Really need help! easy i geuss!
channel.description:
Ok so i just added poly pore following this guide http://www.runelocus.com/forums/showthread.php?73166-PI-Adding-a-Polypore-Staff-317-Server-Sided
But the weird thing is when i go to attack something it says you do not have the right runes or whatever ;P so i brought every type of rune and attacked a npc and it starts alching how do i change it?

item.title: Really need help! easy i geuss!
item.dc:creator: @owwch_u_died owwch u died
item.description:
@owwch_u_died wrote:

Well when you followed that guide did you add a custom made gfx for the polypore? Unless your gunna use regular magic spells with it, then youll need a special downloaded gfx. But if your gunna use just as a staff like “ahrims staff” then just copy all “ahrims staff” code in cliend and add your polypore staffs id under it. =P

Read full topic
item.source: Really need help! easy i geuss!
